body:
Hey guys, iDiamondPorkchop here.
I need a channel icon and channel art for me and Divodo's YouTube channel.
For the channel art please include my skin and http://avicus.net/DivodoPlays skin, and I want it to say "Dooby & Porky."
For the channel icon please put both our skins in it, possibly holding swords.
Please help me! <3 Thank you guys in advance

title: Channel Icon/Art!
